fields.description:
I want to create an alert dialog in xml with internationalized buttons.
The problem is that the buttons are creation only, that means I can't use tss styling.

I cannot use L() in xml between tags, "<ButtonName>"L('test')"</ButtonName>" will create a button with text L('test')

{code}
<AlertDialog id="dialog"  title="Delete"
    message="Delete" cancel="1">
 
 <!-- The ButtonNames tag sets the buttonNames property. -->
       <ButtonNames>
          <ButtonName>"L('test')"</ButtonName>
       </ButtonNames>-->
 </AlertDialog>
{code}

Yes I can do this in the controller but I think this
should be an alloy feature.

A general solution for all creation only elements would be great.
fields.summary: Internationalization in markup required cause of creation only property

comments.body: Just ran into this issue as well. Please prioritise this. Not being able to do internationalisation on buttons is silly. Looks weird to our customers.
+1. I have just ran to the same issue as well.
